original_text: His parents answered them and said, We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind:
korean_text: 그 부모가 대답하여 이르되 이 사람이 우리 아들인 것과 맹인으로 난 것을 아나이다

sentences.original_text: We know that this is our son
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이것이 우리 아들인 줄 아노라

sentences.original_text: and that he was born blind
